WorkflowInfo.Name: Find the newest file in a folder
WorkflowInfo.Description: Find the newest file in a folder
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of all files in a specific folder, sorts them by their creation date (descending) and returns the first file in the list.
